segments.text: Good moming.sir . Here is your breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.Just put it on the table .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: En , would you please give me some bread please ? I am hungry now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I will get you some right now .
segments.speaker: S1
